20101211073632.571|20101211073634.143|CCO|OF SMALL BUSINESS IN THIS
20101211073634.143|20101211073635.714|CCO|EXTREMELY FRAGILE

20101211081405.000|20101211081407.000|CCO|I THINK THE PERFECT MUSS

20101211081409.000|20101211081411.000|CCO|AND AS MUSICIANS ALL WE
20101211081411.000|20101211081412.667|CCO|REALLY DO IS YOU CREATE A
20101211081412.667|20101211081414.333|CCO|RATHER BEAUTIFUL AND ORNATE
20101211081414.333|20101211081416.000|CCO|FRAME FOR THAT PERFECTION
20101211081416.000|20101211081417.667|CCO|WHICH IS SILENCE.
20101211081417.667|20101211081419.333|CCO|SOME OF MY FAVORITE ARTISTS
20101211081419.333|20101211081421.000|CCO|REALLY USE SILENCE VERY
20101211081421.000|20101211081423.000|CCO|CAREFULLY AND VERY
20101211081423.000|20101211081425.000|CCO|ARTISTICALLY.
20101211081425.000|20101211081427.000|CCO|MILES DAVIS, FOR EXAMPLE,
20101211081427.000|20101211081429.000|CCO|KNEW THE VALUE AND THE
